mapper.select: select * from cargo_order where orderno=#{orderno} and origin=#{origin} and destination=#{destination} and customer=#{customer} and tel=#{tel} and startdt=#{startdt} and enddt=#{enddt} and gw=#{gw} and cbm=#{cbm} and cargotype=#{cargotype} and remark=#{remark} and creator=#{creator} and createdt=#{createdt} and modifyby=#{modifyby} and modifydt=#{modifydt}
mapper.insert: insert cargo_order （ orderno, origin, destination, customer, tel, startdt, enddt, gw, cbm, cargotype, remark, creator, createdt, modifyby, modifydt) values( #{orderno}, #{origin}, #{destination}, #{customer}, #{tel}, #{startdt}, #{enddt}, #{gw}, #{cbm}, #{cargotype}, #{remark}, #{creator}, #{createdt}, #{modifyby}, #{modifydt})
mapper.update: update cargo_order set orderno=#{orderno}, origin=#{origin}, destination=#{destination}, customer=#{customer}, tel=#{tel}, startdt=#{startdt}, enddt=#{enddt}, gw=#{gw}, cbm=#{cbm}, cargotype=#{cargotype}, remark=#{remark}, creator=#{creator}, createdt=#{createdt}, modifyby=#{modifyby}, modifydt=#{modifydt} where rowid=#{rowid}
